text: Trailer Tuesday is interested in universe-sized purchases, birthday parties for grim reapers, and making wild bike deliveries this week. Ballionaire “BALLIONAIRE is a fast-paced, kinetic roguelike where strategy meets physics to create outrageous wealth!” Ballionaire is available now on Steam. LOK Digital “Learn a cryptic language of world-changing words and master their mind-bending effects.” LOK Digital is available now on Steam. Universe For Sale “A bizarre bazaar where a young, worried woman crafts entire universes in the palm of her hand. A mysterious cultist who’s stripped the flesh from his bones in order to reach enlightenment. Here, there’s a universe for sale. You buying?” Universe For Sale is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, App Store, Google Play, and Steam. Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island “You’re shipwrecked on a lost mythical island. As backpacker Alex, you must befriend the forgotten gods of Greek mythology and restore their memories.” Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island is available now on the Nintendo eShop, Microsoft Store, and Steam. The Last Hero of Nostalgaia “Nostalgaia, the world of videogames, is collapsing backwards into a mysterious pixelation, with every particle of fidelity bleeding away. Oblivion seemingly awaits even our most cherished gaming memories.” The Last Hero of Nostalgaia is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, and Steam. Party on Hallow Grove “Talk to kooky guests, trade party items, and explore Death’s mansion as you throw him the spookiest birthday party EVER!” Party on Hallow Grove is available now on itch.io, GameJolt, and Steam. Aberration Analyst “Work strange hours … analyze incomplete and unreliable information … save the world from monsters, and shut down their means of access in this experimental, point-and-click supernatural strategy simulator.” Aberration Analyst is available now on itch.io and Steam. Psychopomp GOLD “The catacombs stretch down farther than ever before. Your entire life has been a lie. Delve into the depths, and discover the horrors that lie below.” Psychopomp GOLD is available now on Steam. Spirit Mancer “Slash, Shoot and Break demons. Capture their spirits and summon them out into your battle in the beautiful yet dangerous world of Inferno.” Spirit Mancer is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, and Steam. Adventures of Deliveryman “Prepare for your first day as a delivery hero! Ride through a vibrant city, meet unique characters, and make crucial deliveries in this story-driven adventure.” Adventures of Deliveryman is available now on Steam. About The Author Joel Couture Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
html:
Trailer Tuesday is interested in universe-sized purchases, birthday parties for grim reapers, and making wild bike deliveries this week.

Ballionaire

“BALLIONAIRE is a fast-paced, kinetic roguelike where strategy meets physics to create outrageous wealth!”

Ballionaire is available now on Steam.

LOK Digital

“Learn a cryptic language of world-changing words and master their mind-bending effects.”

LOK Digital is available now on Steam.

Universe For Sale

“A bizarre bazaar where a young, worried woman crafts entire universes in the palm of her hand. A mysterious cultist who’s stripped the flesh from his bones in order to reach enlightenment. Here, there’s a universe for sale. You buying?”

Universe For Sale is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, App Store, Google Play, and Steam.

Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island

“You’re shipwrecked on a lost mythical island. As backpacker Alex, you must befriend the forgotten gods of Greek mythology and restore their memories.”

Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island is available now on the Nintendo eShop, Microsoft Store, and Steam.

The Last Hero of Nostalgaia

“Nostalgaia, the world of videogames, is collapsing backwards into a mysterious pixelation, with every particle of fidelity bleeding away. Oblivion seemingly awaits even our most cherished gaming memories.”

The Last Hero of Nostalgaia is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, and Steam.

Party on Hallow Grove

“Talk to kooky guests, trade party items, and explore Death’s mansion as you throw him the spookiest birthday party EVER!”

Party on Hallow Grove is available now on itch.io, GameJolt, and Steam.

Aberration Analyst

“Work strange hours … analyze incomplete and unreliable information … save the world from monsters, and shut down their means of access in this experimental, point-and-click supernatural strategy simulator.”

Aberration Analyst is available now on itch.io and Steam.

Psychopomp GOLD

“The catacombs stretch down farther than ever before. Your entire life has been a lie. Delve into the depths, and discover the horrors that lie below.”

Psychopomp GOLD is available now on Steam.

Spirit Mancer

“Slash, Shoot and Break demons. Capture their spirits and summon them out into your battle in the beautiful yet dangerous world of Inferno.”

Spirit Mancer is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, and Steam.

Adventures of Deliveryman

“Prepare for your first day as a delivery hero! Ride through a vibrant city, meet unique characters, and make crucial deliveries in this story-driven adventure.”

Adventures of Deliveryman is available now on Steam.

About The Author

Joel Couture

Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
